Magnetic.content:
🟢Burning $MAG worth 11800$ from Dice and Crash

1% of each dice game goes to buy back and burn MAG! 
Today we burned another 4.35 MAG (~11,800$)

Transaction: https://bithomp.com/explorer/3DFE4F0C4AFEF2FD51E966AD0236FB3254CC88312C509F691688A1DDDD35EE81

This is the real hellish burning🔥

Sologenic.content:
From a mainstage keynote to builder roundtables, #Sologenic had a strong presence this year at @xrplapex.

Now advancing the tokenization of U.S. equities, the Sologenic team isn't just talking about the future of finance, but actively building it.
